001
002import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
003import java.io.File;
004import java.io.InputStream;
005import java.net.URL;
006import java.util.ArrayList;
007import java.util.Date;
008import java.util.List;
009import java.util.Random;
010
011/**
012 * web player
013 *
014 * @author matecsaba
015 */
016public class player implements Runnable {
017
018    /**
019     * this is needed for cli startup
020     *
021     * @param args command line parameters
022     */
023    public static void main(String[] args) {
024        player app = new player();
025        String a;
026        try {
027            ByteArrayOutputStream buf = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
028            a = "" + app.getClass();
029            a = player.httpRequest("http://localhost/" + a, "./" + a, "cli", "clibrowser", "user", args, buf);
030            a = "type=" + a + "\r\ndata:\r\n" + buf.toString();
031        } catch (Exception e) {
032            a = "exception " + e.getMessage();
033        }
034        System.out.println(a);
035    }
036
037    /**
038     * where i'm located in ram
039     */
040    protected static player staticPlayer = null;
041
042    /**
043     * where i'm located on host
044     */
045    protected String path = null;
046
047    /**
048     * where i'm located on net, relative
049     */
050    protected String urlR = null;
051
052    /**
053     * where i'm located on net, full
054     */
055    protected String urlF = null;
056
057    /**
058     * wether i'm initialized or nor
059     */
060    protected boolean ready = false;
061
062    private final static Object sleeper = new Object();
063
064    private String mixer = "Master";
065
066    private String srate = "44100";
067
068    private int volMin = 0;
069
070    private int volMax = 100;
071
072    private Random rndSeed = new Random();
073
074    private playerLyric playlists = null;
075
076    private List<playerSong> playlist = new ArrayList<playerSong>();
077
078    private List<playerSong> prelock = null;
079
080    private Process currProc = null;
081
082    private int prevSong = -1;
083
084    private int currSong = -1;
085
086    private List<Integer> nextSong = new ArrayList<Integer>();
087
088    private playerLyric currLyrc = null;
089
090    private long currTime = 0;
091
092    private int currVlme = 0;
093
094    /**
095     * do one request
096     *
097     * @param url url of app
098     * @param path path of app
099     * @param peer client address
100     * @param agent user agent
101     * @param user auth data
102     * @param par parameters
103     * @param buf result buffer, if empty, pathname must present
104     * @return [pathname"][file name.]extension
105     * @throws Exception if something went wrong
106     */
107    public static String httpRequest(String url, String path, String peer, String agent, String user, String[] par, ByteArrayOutputStream buf) throws Exception {
108        if (staticPlayer == null) {
109            staticPlayer = new player();
110            staticPlayer.path = path.substring(0, path.lastIndexOf("."));
111            staticPlayer.urlF = url;
112            staticPlayer.urlR = new URL(url).getPath();
113            staticPlayer.doInit();
114            new Thread(staticPlayer).start();
115        }
116        int i = staticPlayer.doRequest(par, buf);
117        if (i == -2) {
118            return "txt";
119        }
120        if (i < 0) {
121            buf.write("</body></html>".getBytes());
122            return "html";
123        }
124        playerSong sng = staticPlayer.playlist.get(i);
125        String s = new File(sng.file).getName();
126        i = s.lastIndexOf(".");
127        if (i < 0) {
128            return sng.file + "\"" + s;
129        }
130        if (sng.title.length() < 0) {
131            return sng.file + "\"" + s;
132        }
133        return sng.file + "\"" + sng.title + s.substring(i, s.length());
134    }
135
136    private synchronized void startPlay() {
137        currSong = 0;
138        currTime = new Date().getTime();
139        currLyrc = new playerLyric();
140        currLyrc.add("dlna render");
141        try {
142            currProc.destroy();
143        } catch (Exception e) {
144        }
145        currProc = null;
146        try {
147            Runtime rtm = Runtime.getRuntime();
148            String[] cmd = new String[5];
149            cmd[0] = "gmediarender";
150            cmd[1] = "--gstout-audiosink=alsasink";
151            cmd[2] = "--gstout-videosink=appsink";
152            cmd[3] = "--friendly-name=" + urlF;
153            cmd[4] = "--uuid=00001234-1234-1234-" + rndSeed.nextInt();
154            currProc = rtm.exec(cmd);
155        } catch (Exception e) {
156        }
157    }
158
159    private synchronized void startPlay(String url) {
160        currSong = 0;
161        currTime = new Date().getTime();
162        currLyrc = new playerLyric();
163        currLyrc.add("downloading " + url);
164        try {
165            currProc.destroy();
166        } catch (Exception e) {
167        }
168        currProc = null;
169        if (url.length() < 1) {
170            return;
171        }
172        try {
173            Runtime rtm = Runtime.getRuntime();
174            String[] cmd = new String[3];
175            cmd[0] = "sh";
176            cmd[1] = "-c";
177            cmd[2] = "rm -f /tmp/player.*";
178            currProc = rtm.exec(cmd);
179            currProc.waitFor();
180            currProc = null;
181        } catch (Exception e) {
182        }
183        try {
184            Runtime rtm = Runtime.getRuntime();
185            String[] cmd = new String[6];
186            cmd[0] = "youtube-dl";
187            cmd[1] = "--output";
188            cmd[2] = "/tmp/player.url";
189            cmd[3] = "--exec";
190            cmd[4] = "mplayer -ao alsa -vo none -srate " + srate + " {}";
191            cmd[5] = "" + url;
192            currProc = rtm.exec(cmd);
193        } catch (Exception e) {
194        }
195    }
196
197    private synchronized void startPlay(int ntry, String ss) {
198        if ((currSong >= 0) && (prevSong != currSong)) {
199            prevSong = currSong;
200        }
201        try {
202            currProc.destroy();
203        } catch (Exception e) {
204        }
205        for (;;) {
206            if (!nextSong.remove(Integer.valueOf(ntry))) {
207                break;
208            }
209        }
210        for (;;) {
211            if (nextSong.size() > 0) {
212                break;
213            }
214            nextSong.add(rndSeed.nextInt(playlist.size()));
215        }
216        currSong = ntry;
217        currProc = null;
218        currLyrc = null;
219        currTime = 0;
220        if (ntry < 0) {
221            return;
222        }
223        try {
224            Runtime rtm = Runtime.getRuntime();
225            String[] cmd = new String[10];
226            cmd[0] = "mplayer";
227            cmd[1] = "-ao";
228            cmd[2] = "alsa";
229            cmd[3] = "-vo";
230            cmd[4] = "none";
231            cmd[5] = "-srate";
232            cmd[6] = srate;
233            cmd[7] = "-ss";
234            cmd[8] = ss;
235            cmd[9] = playlist.get(ntry).file;
236            currProc = rtm.exec(cmd);
237            currSong = ntry;
238        } catch (Exception e) {
239        }
240        currTime = new Date().getTime() - (playerUtil.str2int(ss) * 1000);
241        try {
242            playerSong sng = playlist.get(currSong);
243            currLyrc = playerUtil.readup(sng.lyrFile());
244        } catch (Exception e) {
245        }
246    }
247
248    private synchronized void setVolume(int vol) {
249        int fvol = volMin + ((vol * (volMax - volMin)) / 100);
250        try {
251            Runtime rtm = Runtime.getRuntime();
252            String[] cmd = new String[4];
253            cmd[0] = "amixer";
254            cmd[1] = "sset";
255            cmd[2] = mixer;
256            cmd[3] = fvol + "%";
257            Process prc = rtm.exec(cmd);
258            prc.waitFor();
259            currVlme = vol;
260        } catch (Exception e) {
261        }
262    }
263
264    private synchronized void stopPlay(String s) {
265        try {
266            Runtime rtm = Runtime.getRuntime();
267            String[] cmd = new String[3];
268            cmd[0] = "killall";
269            cmd[1] = "-9";
270            cmd[2] = s;
271            Process prc = rtm.exec(cmd);
272            prc.waitFor();
273        } catch (Exception e) {
274        }
275    }
276
277    private synchronized void stopPlay() {
278        stopPlay("gmediarender");
279        stopPlay("mplayer");
280        stopPlay("youtube-dl");
281        stopPlay("amixer");
282    }
283
284    /**
285     * initialize
286     */
287    public void doInit() {
288        playlists = playerUtil.readup("/etc/asound.conf");
289        int volDef = 50;
290        if (playlists != null) {
291            for (int i = 0; i < playlists.size(); i++) {
292                String a = playlists.get(i);
293                int o = a.indexOf("=");
294                if (o < 0) {
295                    continue;
296                }
297                String b = a.substring(o + 1, a.length()).trim();
298                a = a.substring(0, o).trim();
299                if (a.equals("#player.class mixer")) {
300                    mixer = b;
301                    continue;
302                }
303                if (a.equals("#player.class srate")) {
304                    srate = b;
305                    continue;
306                }
307                if (a.equals("#player.class volmin")) {
308                    volMin = playerUtil.str2int(b);
309                    continue;
310                }
311                if (a.equals("#player.class volmax")) {
312                    volMax = playerUtil.str2int(b);
313                    continue;
314                }
315                if (a.equals("#player.class voldef")) {
316                    volDef = playerUtil.str2int(b);
317                    continue;
318                }
319            }
320        }
321        playlists = playerUtil.readup(path + ".cfg");
322        playlist = playerSong.txt2pls(null, playerUtil.readup(playlists.get(0)));
323        prelock = playlist;
324        setVolume(volDef);
325        startPlay(-1, "0");
326        ready = true;
327    }
328
329    public void run() {
330        for (;;) {
331            try {
332                synchronized (sleeper) {
333                    sleeper.wait(1000);
334                }
335            } catch (Exception ex) {
336            }
337            try {
338                if (currProc != null) {
339                    flushStream(currProc.getErrorStream());
340                    flushStream(currProc.getInputStream());
341                    currProc.exitValue();
342                }
343            } catch (Exception e) {
344                continue;
345            }
346            if (currSong < 0) {
347                continue;
348            }
349            startPlay(nextSong.get(0), "0");
350        }
351    }
352
353    /**
354     * put starting
355     *
356     * @param buf buffer to use
357     * @param refresh refresh interval
358     * @throws Exception on error
359     */
360    public void putStart(ByteArrayOutputStream buf, int refresh) throws Exception {
361        String a = "<html><head><title>music player</title><meta charset=\"utf-8\">";
362        buf.write(a.getBytes());
363        if (refresh > 0) {
364            a = "<meta http-equiv=refresh content=\"" + refresh + ";url=" + urlR + "\">";
365            buf.write(a.getBytes());
366        }
367        a = "</head><body bgcolor=\"#000000\" text=\"#00FF00\" link=\"#00FFFF\" vlink=\"#00FFFF\" alink=\"#00FFFF\">";
368        buf.write(a.getBytes());
369    }
370
371    /**
372     * put one link
373     *
374     * @param buf buffer to use
375     * @param url url to link to
376     * @param txt text to use
377     * @throws Exception on error
378     */
379    public void putLink(ByteArrayOutputStream buf, String url, String txt) throws Exception {
380        String a = "((<a href=\"" + url + "\">" + txt + "</a>))";
381        buf.write(a.getBytes());
382    }
383
384    /**
385     * put menu items
386     *
387     * @param buf buffer to use
388     * @return currently playing song
389     * @throws Exception on error
390     */
391    public playerSong putMenu(ByteArrayOutputStream buf) throws Exception {
392        putLink(buf, urlR + "?cmd=list&song=", "playlist");
393        putLink(buf, urlR + "?cmd=song&song=", "find");
394        putLink(buf, urlR, "fresh");
395        putLink(buf, urlR + "?cmd=play&song=-1", "stop");
396        putLink(buf, urlR + "?cmd=play&song=" + prevSong, "prev");
397        putLink(buf, urlR + "?cmd=play&song=" + nextSong.get(0), "next");
398        putLink(buf, urlR + "?cmd=queue&song=", "queue");
399        buf.write("<br/>".getBytes());
400        if (currSong >= playlist.size()) {
401            currSong = -1;
402        }
403        if (currSong < 0) {
404            return null;
405        }
406        playerSong sng = playlist.get(currSong);
407        String s = "file: " + sng.file + "<br/>";
408        buf.write(s.getBytes());
409        s = "song: " + sng.title + "<br/>";
410        buf.write(s.getBytes());
411        putLink(buf, urlR + "?cmd=play&song=" + currSong, "replay");
412        putLink(buf, urlR + "?cmd=artistsong&song=" + currSong, "artist");
413        putLink(buf, urlR + "?cmd=albumsong&song=" + currSong, "album");
414        putLink(buf, urlR + "?cmd=download&song=" + currSong, "download");
415        putLink(buf, urlR + "?cmd=vol", "volume");
416        putLink(buf, urlR + "?cmd=seek", "seek");
417        buf.write("<br/>".getBytes());
418        return sng;
419    }
420
421    /**
422     * put find bar
423     *
424     * @param buf buffer to use
425     * @param flt filter text
426     * @throws Exception on error
427     */
428    public void putFind(ByteArrayOutputStream buf, String flt) throws Exception {
429        String s = "<form action=\"" + urlR + "\" method=get><input type=text name=song value=\"" + flt + "\">";
430        buf.write(s.getBytes());
431        buf.write("<input type=submit name=cmd value=\"song\">".getBytes());
432        buf.write("<input type=submit name=cmd value=\"album\">".getBytes());
433        buf.write("<input type=submit name=cmd value=\"lock\">".getBytes());
434        buf.write("<input type=submit name=cmd value=\"albums\">".getBytes());
435        buf.write("</form>".getBytes());
436    }
437
438    /**
439     * find songs
440     *
441     * @param buf buffer to use
442     * @param sng song to find
443     * @param res results found
444     * @throws Exception on error
445     */
446    public void doFind(ByteArrayOutputStream buf, String sng, List<String> res) throws Exception {
447        final int max = 100;
448        putStart(buf, -1);
449        putMenu(buf);
450        putFind(buf, sng);
451        String a = res.size() + " results:<br/>";
452        buf.write(a.getBytes());
453        if (res.size() < max) {
454            for (int i = 0; i < res.size(); i++) {
455                buf.write(res.get(i).getBytes());
456            }
457        } else {
458            Random rnd = new Random();
459            for (int i = 0; i < max; i++) {
460                buf.write(res.get(rnd.nextInt(res.size())).getBytes());
461            }
462            buf.write(("and " + (res.size() - max) + " more!<br/>").getBytes());
463        }
464        putFind(buf, sng);
465        putMenu(buf);
466    }
467
468    /**
469     * to found line
470     *
471     * @param num number of entry
472     * @param ntry entry value
473     * @return string to add
474     */
475    public String toFound1(int num, playerSong ntry) {
476        return "((<a href=\"" + urlR + "?cmd=enq&song=" + num + "\">Q</a>))<a href=\"" + urlR + "?cmd=play&song=" + num + "\">" + ntry.title + "</a><br/>";
477    }
478
479    /**
480     * to found line
481     *
482     * @param ntry entry value
483     * @return string to add
484     */
485    public String toFound2(playerSong ntry) {
486        String a = ntry.justPath();
487        return "<a href=\"" + urlR + "?cmd=album&song=" + a + "\">" + a + "</a><br/>";
488    }
489
490    /**
491     * flush input stream
492     *
493     * @param strm stream to flush
494     * @throws Exception on error
495     */
496    public static void flushStream(InputStream strm) throws Exception {
497        byte[] buf = new byte[strm.available()];
498        if (buf.length < 1) {
499            return;
500        }
501        strm.read(buf);
502    }
503
504    /**
505     * do one request
506     *
507     * @param par parameters
508     * @param buf buffer to use
509     * @return -1 on html result
510     * @throws Exception on error
511     */
512    public int doRequest(String[] par, ByteArrayOutputStream buf) throws Exception {
513        if (!ready) {
514            putStart(buf, 5);
515            buf.write("player initializes!".getBytes());
516            return -1;
517        }
518        String song = "-1";
519        String cmd = "";
520        for (int pn = 0; pn < par.length; pn++) {
521            String a = par[pn];
522            int i = a.indexOf("=");
523            if (i < 0) {
524                continue;
525            }
526            String b = a.substring(0, i);
527            a = a.substring(i + 1, a.length());
528            if (b.equals("cmd")) {
529                cmd = a;
530            }
531            if (b.equals("song")) {
532                song = a;
533            }
534        }
535        if (cmd.equals("albumsong")) {
536            int i = playerUtil.str2int(song);
537            playerSong sng = playlist.get(i);
538            song = new File(sng.file).getParent();
539            cmd = "album";
540        }
541        if (cmd.equals("artistsong")) {
542            int i = playerUtil.str2int(song);
543            playerSong sng = playlist.get(i);
544            song = new File(sng.file).getParent();
545            i = song.indexOf(" - ");
546            if (i >= 0) {
547                song = song.substring(0, i + 2);
548            }
549            cmd = "album";
550        }
551        if (cmd.equals("song")) {
552            cmd = ".*" + song.trim().toLowerCase().replaceAll(" ", ".*") + ".*";
553            List<String> res = new ArrayList<String>();
554            for (int i = 0; i < playlist.size(); i++) {
555                playerSong ntry = playlist.get(i);
556                if (!ntry.title.toLowerCase().matches(cmd)) {
557                    continue;
558                }
559                res.add(toFound1(i, ntry));
560            }
561            doFind(buf, song, res);
562            return -1;
563        }
564        if (cmd.equals("albums")) {
565            cmd = ".*" + song.trim().toLowerCase().replaceAll(" ", ".*") + ".*";
566            List<String> res = new ArrayList<String>();
567            String old = "<null>";
568            for (int i = 0; i < playlist.size(); i++) {
569                playerSong ntry = playlist.get(i);
570                if (!ntry.file.toLowerCase().matches(cmd)) {
571                    continue;
572                }
573                if (!ntry.justPath().toLowerCase().matches(cmd)) {
574                    continue;
575                }
576                String a = toFound2(ntry);
577                if (a.equals(old)) {
578                    continue;
579                }
580                res.add(a);
581                old = a;
582            }
583            doFind(buf, song, res);
584            return -1;
585        }
586        if (cmd.equals("album")) {
587            cmd = ".*" + song.trim().toLowerCase().replaceAll(" ", ".*") + ".*";
588            List<String> res = new ArrayList<String>();
589            for (int i = 0; i < playlist.size(); i++) {
590                playerSong ntry = playlist.get(i);
591                if (!ntry.file.toLowerCase().matches(cmd)) {
592                    continue;
593                }
594                res.add(toFound1(i, ntry));
595            }
596            doFind(buf, song, res);
597            return -1;
598        }
599        if (cmd.equals("lock")) {
600            putStart(buf, -1);
601            putMenu(buf);
602            cmd = ".*" + song.trim().toLowerCase().replaceAll(" ", ".*") + ".*";
603            List<playerSong> res = new ArrayList<playerSong>();
604            for (int i = 0; i < playlist.size(); i++) {
605                playerSong ntry = playlist.get(i);
606                if (!ntry.file.toLowerCase().matches(cmd)) {
607                    continue;
608                }
609                res.add(ntry);
610            }
611            playlist = res;
612            buf.write("lockin successfully finished!<br/>".getBytes());
613            return -1;
614        }
615        if (cmd.equals("reload")) {
616            putStart(buf, 5);
617            putMenu(buf);
618            buf.write("as requested, rebooting for you".getBytes());
619            staticPlayer = null;
620            startPlay(-1, "0");
621            return -1;
622        }
623        if (cmd.equals("seek")) {
624            putStart(buf, -1);
625            putMenu(buf);
626            int i = playerUtil.str2int(song);
627            if (i > 0) {
628                String a = "seek to " + song + " seconds.<br/><br/>";
629                buf.write(a.getBytes());
630                startPlay(currSong, song);
631            }
632            int tim = (int) ((new Date().getTime() - currTime) / 1000);
633            String a = "playing since " + tim + " seconds.<br/>";
634            buf.write(a.getBytes());
635            a = "<br/>seek to:";
636            buf.write(a.getBytes());
637            for (i = -15; i < 15; i++) {
638                int o = tim + i;
639                if (o < 0) {
640                    continue;
641                }
642                a = "" + o;
643                if (o == tim) {
644                    a = "*" + a + "*";
645                }
646                putLink(buf, urlR + "?cmd=seek&song=" + o, a);
647            }
648            a = "<br/><br/>seek to:";
649            buf.write(a.getBytes());
650            tim /= 10;
651            for (i = 0; i < 30; i++) {
652                int o = (i + 1) * 10;
653                a = "" + o;
654                if (i == tim) {
655                    a = "*" + a + "*";
656                }
657                putLink(buf, urlR + "?cmd=seek&song=" + o, a);
658            }
659            return -1;
660        }
661        if (cmd.equals("fav")) {
662            putStart(buf, 5);
663            playerSong sng = putMenu(buf);
664            if (sng == null) {
665                return -1;
666            }
667            String s = playlists.get(0);
668            playerUtil.append(s, "File1=" + sng.file);
669            playerUtil.append(s, "Title1=" + sng.title);
670            buf.write("saved to favorites<br/>".getBytes());
671            return -1;
672        }
673        if (cmd.equals("vol")) {
674            putStart(buf, -1);
675            putMenu(buf);
676            int i = playerUtil.str2int(song);
677            if (i >= 0) {
678                setVolume(i);
679                String a = "volume set to " + currVlme + " percent.<br/><br/>";
680                buf.write(a.getBytes());
681            }
682            buf.write("<br/><br/>volume:".getBytes());
683            for (i = -15; i < 15; i++) {
684                int o = currVlme + i;
685                if (o < 0) {
686                    continue;
687                }
688                if (o > 100) {
689                    continue;
690                }
691                String a = "" + o;
692                if (o == currVlme) {
693                    a = "*" + a + "*";
694                }
695                putLink(buf, urlR + "?cmd=vol&song=" + o, a);
696            }
697            buf.write("<br/><br/>volume:".getBytes());
698            for (i = 0; i < 11; i++) {
699                int o = i * 10;
700                String a = "" + o;
701                if ((o / 10) == (currVlme / 10)) {
702                    a = "*" + a + "*";
703                }
704                putLink(buf, urlR + "?cmd=vol&song=" + o, a);
705            }
706            return -1;
707        }
708        if (cmd.equals("unlock")) {
709            putStart(buf, 5);
710            putMenu(buf);
711            String a = "<br/>unlock successful.<br/>";
712            buf.write(a.getBytes());
713            playlist = prelock;
714            return -1;
715        }
716        if (cmd.equals("resync")) {
717            putStart(buf, 5);
718            putMenu(buf);
719            String a = "<br/>all active players synchronized.<br/>";
720            buf.write(a.getBytes());
721            rndSeed = new Random(playerUtil.str2int(song));
722            nextSong.clear();
723            nextSong.add(rndSeed.nextInt(playlist.size()));
724            return -1;
725        }
726        if (cmd.equals("queue")) {
727            putStart(buf, -1);
728            putMenu(buf);
729            buf.write("queued songs:<br/>".getBytes());
730            for (int i = 0; i < nextSong.size(); i++) {
731                playerSong ntry = playlist.get(nextSong.get(i));
732                String a = ntry.title + "<br/>";
733                buf.write(a.getBytes());
734            }
735            return -1;
736        }
737        if (cmd.equals("enq")) {
738            String a;
739            int i = playerUtil.str2int(song);
740            if (i == currSong) {
741                a = "not qeueued<br/>";
742            } else {
743                nextSong.add(i);
744                a = "queued song #" + i + "<br/>";
745            }
746            putStart(buf, 3);
747            putMenu(buf);
748            buf.write(a.getBytes());
749            return -1;
750        }
751        if (cmd.equals("pendrive")) {
752            putStart(buf, -1);
753            putMenu(buf);
754            findSongs fnd = new findSongs();
755            fnd.doFind("/media");
756            fnd.doFind("/mnt");
757            fnd.doSort();
758            playlist = fnd.lst;
759            prelock = playlist;
760            String a = "media scanned, " + playlist.size() + " songs found.<br/><br/>";
761            buf.write(a.getBytes());
762            return -1;
763        }
764        if (cmd.equals("list")) {
765            putStart(buf, -1);
766            putMenu(buf);
767            int i = playerUtil.str2int(song);
768            if (i > 0) {
769                ready = false;
770                playlist = playerSong.txt2pls(null, playerUtil.readup(playlists.get(i - 1)));
771                prelock = playlist;
772                ready = true;
773                String a = "playlist #" + song + " selected with " + playlist.size() + " songs.<br/><br/>";
774                buf.write(a.getBytes());
775            }
776            for (i = 0; i < playlists.size(); i++) {
777                String a = "<a href=\"" + urlR + "?cmd=list&song=" + (i + 1) + "\">" + playlists.get(i) + "</a><br/>";
778                buf.write(a.getBytes());
779            }
780            String a = "mixer=" + mixer + ", rate=" + srate + ", songs=" + playlist.size() + ", volmin=" + volMin + ", volmax=" + volMax + ", lists=" + playlists.size() + "<br/>";
781            buf.write(a.getBytes());
782            a = "<br/><a href=\"" + urlR + "?cmd=resync&song=" + new Random().nextInt() + "\">!resync!</a><br/>";
783            buf.write(a.getBytes());
784            a = "<a href=\"" + urlR + "?cmd=unlock\">!unlock!</a><br/>";
785            buf.write(a.getBytes());
786            a = "<a href=\"" + urlR + "?cmd=pendrive\">!pendrive!</a><br/>";
787            buf.write(a.getBytes());
788            a = "<a href=\"" + urlR + "?cmd=dlna\">!dlna!</a><br/>";
789            buf.write(a.getBytes());
790            a = "<a href=\"" + urlR + "?cmd=nodlna\">!nodlna!</a><br/>";
791            buf.write(a.getBytes());
792            a = "<br/><form action=\"" + urlR + "\" method=get>url:<input type=text name=song value=\"\"><input type=submit name=cmd value=\"url\"></form><br/>";
793            buf.write(a.getBytes());
794            return -1;
795        }
796        if (cmd.equals("url")) {
797            putStart(buf, 120);
798            putMenu(buf);
799            String a = "<br/>downloading song, please wait.<br/>";
800            buf.write(a.getBytes());
801            startPlay(song);
802            return -1;
803        }
804        if (cmd.equals("nodlna")) {
805            putStart(buf, 5);
806            putMenu(buf);
807            String a = "<br/>stopping dlna server.<br/>";
808            buf.write(a.getBytes());
809            stopPlay();
810            return -1;
811        }
812        if (cmd.equals("dlna")) {
813            putStart(buf, 5);
814            putMenu(buf);
815            String a = "<br/>starting dlna server.<br/>";
816            buf.write(a.getBytes());
817            startPlay();
818            return -1;
819        }
820        if (cmd.equals("download")) {
821            return playerUtil.str2int(song);
822        }
823        if (cmd.equals("title")) {
824            String a;
825            if ((currSong >= playlist.size()) || (currSong < 0)) {
826                a = "stopped";
827            } else {
828                a = playlist.get(currSong).title;
829            }
830            buf.reset();
831            buf.write(a.getBytes());
832            return -2;
833        }
834        if (cmd.equals("stop")) {
835            startPlay(-1, "0");
836            putStart(buf, 1);
837            putMenu(buf);
838            buf.write("selected no song<br/>".getBytes());
839            return -1;
840        }
841        if (cmd.equals("replay")) {
842            startPlay(currSong, "0");
843            putStart(buf, 1);
844            putMenu(buf);
845            buf.write("selected current song<br/>".getBytes());
846            return -1;
847        }
848        if (cmd.equals("next")) {
849            startPlay(nextSong.get(0), "0");
850            putStart(buf, 1);
851            putMenu(buf);
852            buf.write("selected next song<br/>".getBytes());
853            return -1;
854        }
855        if (cmd.equals("prev")) {
856            startPlay(prevSong, "0");
857            putStart(buf, 1);
858            putMenu(buf);
859            buf.write("selected previous song<br/>".getBytes());
860            return -1;
861        }
862        if (cmd.equals("play")) {
863            startPlay(playerUtil.str2int(song), "0");
864            putStart(buf, 1);
865            putMenu(buf);
866            String a = "selected song #" + song + "<br/>";
867            buf.write(a.getBytes());
868            return -1;
869        }
870        if (currSong < 0) {
871            putStart(buf, 5);
872            putMenu(buf);
873            buf.write("player currently stopped!".getBytes());
874            return -1;
875        }
876        putStart(buf, 15);
877        playerSong sng = putMenu(buf);
878        if (currLyrc != null) {
879            buf.write("lyrics:<br/><br/>".getBytes());
880            for (int i = 0; i < currLyrc.size(); i++) {
881                cmd = currLyrc.get(i) + "<br/>";
882                buf.write(cmd.getBytes());
883            }
884        }
885        if (sng != null) {
886            String a = sng.title.replaceAll(" ", "+");
887            a = "http://www.google.com/search?q=" + a + "&tbm=vid";
888            a = "clip: <a href=\"" + a + "\">" + a + "</a><br/>";
889            buf.write(a.getBytes());
890        }
891        putMenu(buf);
892        return -1;
893    }
894
895}
